definitions.definition: A constituency won with a small margin.
Of, relating to, or located at or near a margin or edge; also figurative usages of location and margin (edge).
definitions.example: In recent years there has been an increase in violence against marginal groups.

definitions.definition: Determined by a small margin; having a salient characteristic determined by a small margin.
Pertaining to changes resulting from a unit increase in production or consumption of a good.
